attributes.additional_details:
There is a need to change the Immigation Laws for the UK.

1. Anyone wishing to come/remain to/in the UK must sign a legal document stating they will not claim any form of benefit for 5 years on arrival in the UK
2. Anyone wishing to remain in the UK must sign must sign a legal document stating that ifg they commit an offence in the UK they will be returned (at their expense) back to the country they came from.
3. They will ahve to sign a legal document saying they will not use the Human rights law and will not appeal against their removal.
